about.title: About Me
about.description: As a passionate Information Technology graduate with expertise in artificial intelligence, full-stack development, and data analytics, I am dedicated to building innovative software solutions that solve real-world problems. With strong project experience and professional certifications, I aim to contribute as an AI Developer or Full-Stack Developer in roles that challenge my analytical thinking and technical skills.
about.userFocusedDesc: Crafting intuitive and engaging user experiences is my top priority.
about.analyticalProblemSolverDesc: I enjoy tackling complex challenges and finding innovative, analytical solutions.
about.performanceDrivenDesc: Building fast, scalable, and reliable applications.
about.bachelorDegree: Bachelor's degree | College of Information Technology
